inotes.ALL: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.CNS: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.CP: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.EWS: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.HL: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.OS: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".
inotes.RMS: Note: If multiple causes of death, include one observation per cause of death. However, only one cause of death can have the varaiable CAUSE_OF_DEATH_RANKING=Primary. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead".

inotes.ALL: Note: If multiple treatment types, include one observation per treatment type. | Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead" and CAUSE_OF_DEATH is "Treatment-related mortality".
inotes.HL: Note: If multiple treatment types, include one observation per treatment type. | Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead" and CAUSE_OF_DEATH is "Treatment-related mortality".

inotes.ALL: Note: If multiple cause of death details, include one observation per cause of death detail. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"
inotes.HL: Note: If multiple cause of death details, include one observation per cause of death detail. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"

inotes.ALL: Note: There may be multiple contributory causes of death, but only one primary cause of death. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"
inotes.CNS: Note: There may be multiple contributory causes of death, but only one primary cause of death. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"
inotes.EWS: Note: There may be multiple contributory causes of death, but only one primary cause of death. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"
inotes.HL: Note: There may be multiple contributory causes of death, but only one primary cause of death. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"
inotes.OS: Note: There may be multiple contributory causes of death, but only one primary cause of death. Note: Only fill in this variable if LKSS is "Dead"

inotes.CNS: Note: String result can include anything that is not a single numeric result, i.e. "Positive", "Negative", "Present", "Absent", "Yes", "No", "Elevated," "Depressed", "Above threshold", "Below threshold", ranges, as well as bucketed categories, etc... Note: Only fill in this variable when the available data is anything EXCEPT a single numeric value, and include the entire available data as a string, including units if applicable

inotes.OS: Note: If there were multiple primary sites, include one observation per primary site.
inotes.RMS: Note: If there were multiple primary sites, include one observation per primary site.

mappings.GCT: skos:exactMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Tumor Assessment].[TUMOR_SITE].[Not Reported] || skos:exactMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Tumor Assessment].[NODAL_SITE].[Not Reported]

inotes.NBL: Only to be used for "Primary" tumors

inotes.CP: Note: If there were multiple staging systems used, include one observation per staging system
inotes.HL: Note: If there were multiple staging systems used, include one observation per staging system
inotes.RB: Note: If there were multiple staging systems used, include one observation per staging system

inotes.CNS: Note: PNET should be reported as Embryonal Tumor, NOS

inotes.RB: Use if TECHNIQUE == "Brachytherapy"
Use if TECHNIQUE == "Brachytherapy"

inotes.CNS: All XRT data for COG will be intended dose.
Note: Only if BOOST = "Yes"
Note: Only if BOOST = "Yes"
Note: Only if BOOST = "Yes"

mappings.EWS: skos:broadMatch [EWS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE] || skos:broadMatch [EWS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE_NUMBER] || skos:broadMatch [EWS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE] || skos:broadMatch [EWS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE_NUMBER]
mappings.HL: skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE] || skos:broadMatch[HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE_NUMBER] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE_NUMBER]
mappings.OS: skos:broadMatch [OS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE] || skos:broadMatch [OS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[DISEASE_PHASE_NUMBER] || skos:broadMatch [OS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE] || skos:broadMatch [OS].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[COURSE_NUMBER]

inotes.HL: Note: If RESPONSE_CATEGORY is "Overall response" and not based on a single response method, RESPONSE_METHOD should be "Not applicable"
Note: HL should only accept first-degree relations

mappings.HL: skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Protocol Treatment Modifications].[DISEASE_PHASE] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Protocol Treatment Modifications].[DISEASE_PHASE_NUMBER] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Protocol Treatment Modifications].[COURSE] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Protocol Treatment Modifications].[COURSE_NUMBER]

inotes.CP: Note: If multiple modifications made, include one observation per modification.

inotes.HL: Note: Only fill in Disease Phase, Disease Phase Number, Course, and Course Number if "AGE_" not known Note: Course Number is grouped within subcategory. I.e. number Induction 1, 2, 3, 4, etc..., Prephase 1, 2, 3, 4, etc..., Maintenance 1,2,3,4,5,6 etc...
Note: If multiple modifications made, include one observation per modification.

inotes.EWS: Note: Should be the result of a the pathologic assessment

mappings.GCT: skos:exactMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[MARGINS].[R0 - Complete Resection, Negative Margins]
skos:exactMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[MARGINS].[R1 - Complete Resection, Positive Margins]

inotes.EWS: Note: String result can include anything that is not a numeric result, i.e. "Positive", "Negative", "Present", "Absent", "Yes", "No", "Elevated," "Depressed", "Above threshold", "Below threshold", as well as bucketed categories, etc...
Only if the "multiple" tumors/lesions don't have individual characteristics to report. Otherwise, report as multiple rows.
Note: Only fill in if MET_LUNG_DISEASE_MGMT was completed.
Note: Only fill in when answered "Yes" for RECOVERY_STATUS. The first day you reach the recovery level per RECOVERY_TYPE.
Note: Include one decimal place.
inotes.OS: Note: Include one decimal place.

inotes.RB: If TREATMENT_RELATED == "Yes"

mappings.HL: skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Secondary Malignant Neoplasm].[SMN_FIELD].[Margin of XRT Field]
skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Secondary Malignant Neoplasm].[SMN_FIELD].[Out of XRT Field]

inotes.RMS: Note: String result can include anything that is not a single numeric result, i.e. "Positive", "Negative", "Present", "Absent", "Yes", "No", "Elevated," "Depressed", "Above threshold", "Below threshold", ranges, as well as bucketed categories, etc... Note: Only fill in this variable when the available data is anything EXCEPT a single numeric value, and include the entire available data as a string, including units if applicable

inotes.GCT: Note: String result can include anything that is not a sinlge numeric result, i.e. "Positive", "Negative", "Present", "Absent", "Yes", "No", "Elevated," "Depressed", "Above threshold", "Below threshold", ranges, as well as bucketed categories, etc...
Note: Only associated with Immature Teratoma.
Note: Only associated with Mature and Immature Teratoma
Note: Only associated with Somatic Malignancy

mappings.GCT: skos:broadMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Disease Characteristics].[IGCCC_RISK_GROUP].[Not Reported] || skos:broadMatch [GCT].[v1.0].[Disease Characteristics].[MAGIC_RISK_GROUP].[Not Reported]

inotes.HL: Note: If multiple measures per trial, include one observation per measure
inotes.OS: Note: If multiple measures per trial, include one observation per measure

mappings.HL: skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Lesion Characteristics].[DIAM_DIM1_TYPE] || skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Lesion Characteristics].[DIAM_DIM2_TYPE] || skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Lesion Characteristics].[DIAM_DIM3_TYPE]

inotes.HL: Note: Number of involved nodes refers to the site listed in SURGERY_SITE
Note: Number of involved nodes refers to the site listed in SURGERY_SITE

mappings.HL: skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[PROCEDURE_PURPOSE].[Second Look Surgery to Attempt Total Resection]
skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Biopsy/Surgical Procedures].[PROCEDURE_PURPOSE].[Biopsy of Distant Site for Staging]

inotes.HL: Note: Only fill in this variable if ADVERSE_EVENT is "Infection" and there is a value filled in for PATHOGEN.
Note: If multiple late effects, include one observation per late effect.

mappings.HL: skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Late Effects].[LE] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Late Effects].[LE_DETAIL] || skos:broadMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Late Effects].[LE_SUB_DETAIL]
skos:exactMatch [HL].[v1.0].[Late Effects].[LE_SEVERITY_GRADE].[Death Related to Adverse Event]

inotes.HL: Note: If multiple time points per measure, include one observation per time point

mappings.NBL: skos:exactMatch [NBL].[v3.0].[Subject Characteristics].[CENSOR_STATUS].[Subject is censored (i.e. has had no events(s))]
skos:exactMatch [NBL].[v3.0].[Subject Characteristics].[CENSOR_STATUS].[Subject has had one or more events]

inotes.RB: Note: For RB, this field should be used to designate the cycle of systemic chemotherapy being described in the observation
Note: For RB, this field should be used to designate the anticipated number of cycles of systemic chemotherapy that will be administered to the patient,
Note: For RB, this field should be used to designate the intra-arterial chemotherapy session
Use if ENERGY_TYPE == "Proton"
Use if TECHNIQUE == "Brachytherapy"
